overview.summary: Represents a Firebird Event. This class cannot be inherited.

event.name: RemoteEventCounts
event.summary: Gets or sets the event handlers that will be fired each time the event counts notification is received from server.

property.name: Connection
property.summary: Gets or sets the associated to the remote event.

property.name: HasChanges
property.summary: Incates if there are changes in the event counts since the last time they were received.

indexer.name: Item(System.Int32)
indexer.summary: Gets the event name at the specified index.

constructor.name: ctor(FbConnection)
constructor.summary: Creates a new instance of the class with the given instance.

constructor.name: ctor(FbConnection, System.Array)
constructor.summary: Creates a new instance of the class with the given instance and the given list of events.
constructor.exception: If the event list count is greater than 15.

method.name: AddEvents(System.Array)
method.summary: Adds the specified events to the event list.
method.remarks: If there are existent events in the list of requested events that will be lost.
method.exception: If the events parameter is null.
If the event list count is greater than 15.

method.name: QueueEvents
method.summary: Register interest in a set of events (works in asynchronous mode).

method.name: Cancel
method.summary: Cancels interest in the registered set of events.
